SEARCH:
模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager

类 ActiveActorManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager.ActiveActorManager
public class ActiveActorManager extends Object
Manages the active actors in the game, including friendly units, enemy units, user projectiles, enemy projectiles, ammo boxes, and hearts. Provides methods to update and access all actors within these categories.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    private final List<ActiveActorDestructible>
    ammoBoxes
    The list of ammo boxes (e.g., power-ups that replenish ammo).
    private final List<ActiveActorDestructible>
    enemyProjectiles
    The list of enemy projectiles (e.g., bullets fired by the enemies).
    private final List<ActiveActorDestructible>
    enemyUnits
    The list of enemy units (e.g., enemy-controlled planes).
    private final List<ActiveActorDestructible>
    friendlyUnits
    The list of friendly units (e.g., player-controlled planes).
    private final List<ActiveActorDestructible>
    hearts
    The list of hearts (e.g., health power-ups).
    private final List<ActiveActorDestructible>
    userProjectiles
    The list of user projectiles (e.g., bullets fired by the player).

    修饰符和类型

    说明

    Returns a combined list of all active actors, including friendly units, enemy units, user projectiles, enemy projectiles, ammo boxes, and hearts.

    Returns the list of ammo boxes (e.g., power-ups that replenish ammo).

    getEnemyUnits()

    getFriendlyUnits()
    Returns the list of friendly units (e.g., player-controlled planes).
    List<ActiveActorDestructible>
    getHearts()
    Returns the list of hearts (e.g., health power-ups).
    List<ActiveActorDestructible>
    getUserProjectiles()
    Returns the list of user projectiles (e.g., bullets fired by the player).

  • 方法详细资料

    • updateActors

      public void updateActors()
      Updates all the active actors in the game. Calls the updateActor method on each actor in the lists of friendly units, enemy units, projectiles, ammo boxes, and hearts.

    • getAllActors

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> getAllActors()
      Returns a combined list of all active actors, including friendly units, enemy units, user projectiles, enemy projectiles, ammo boxes, and hearts.
      返回:
      a list containing all active actors.

    • getFriendlyUnits

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> getFriendlyUnits()
      Returns the list of friendly units (e.g., player-controlled planes).
      返回:
      a list of friendly units.

    • getEnemyUnits

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> getEnemyUnits()
      Returns the list of enemy units (e.g., enemy-controlled planes).
      返回:
      a list of enemy units.

    • getUserProjectiles

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> getUserProjectiles()
      Returns the list of user projectiles (e.g., bullets fired by the player).
      返回:
      a list of user projectiles.

    • getEnemyProjectiles

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> getEnemyProjectiles()
      Returns the list of enemy projectiles (e.g., bullets fired by the enemies).
      返回:
      a list of enemy projectiles.

    • getAmmoBoxes

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> getAmmoBoxes()
      Returns the list of ammo boxes (e.g., power-ups that replenish ammo).
      返回:
      a list of ammo boxes.

    • getHearts

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> getHearts()
      Returns the list of hearts (e.g., health power-ups).
      返回:
